thread.title: Omar
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Omar

author: Omar
title: Omar
text: I've stayed away from tax preparers due to a bad experience I had 2002, and have done my own taxes ever since. After being referred to R&G Brenner, I opted to give them a try and I'm glad I did. My experience was great and the preparer was very helpful at both asking pertinent questions to my taxes AND explaining the reasons to the amount of my return. Highly recommended!
